name: Gift of Renewal
description: To facilitate life is to honor the will of the divine, and to deny it is blasphemy.
effect: Followers of Xerneas may call upon 'Gift of Renewal' once per quest as a bonus action during their combat turn, allowing them to heal a chosen ally or themselves for 4 HP. A point of Will may be spent to increase this healing to 6 HP. At Luminary, gain 2 uses. At High Priest(ess), gain 3.
